flawed_nl_solution:
She plays 480 notes because 8 x 60 = <<8*60=480>>480
This is 12 blocks of 40 notes because 480/40=<<480/40=12>>12
She makes 63 mistakes because 12 x 3 = <<12*3=63>>63
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
